Package sprites

Class Player

java.lang.Object
sprites.Sprite
sprites.Player
public class Player
extends Sprite
Author:
Aviral Vaidya, Kevin Ren The Player class represents a double precision player that can be visualized using the processing library

    • Player

      public Player​(aviral.shapes.Circle s, double vx, double vy, double ax, double ay, int totalLives)
      creates a player object
      Parameters:
      s - shape of player
      vx - x velocity of player
      vy - y velocity of player
      ax - x acceleration of player
      ay - y acceleration of player
      totalLives - total lives of player
